article_title: Death Panels And Out-of-Pocket Health Care Costs

article_metadata.description: Recently, I wrote an Op-Ed in the New York Times calling upon physicians to discuss out-of-pocket costs with their patients before making medical decisions, and urging patients to take matters into their own hands if their physicians fail to initiate such conversations. This Op-Ed closely mirrored an argument I made in the New England Journal [...]
article_metadata.author: Peter Ubel
